items.title: Rare wildflowers blanket Atacama desert
items.description: One of the world's driest deserts is transformed into a sea of wildflowers after a rare bloom.

items.title: Icebreakers and golf spark Trump and Finnish leader's unlikely friendship
items.description: Alexander Stubb has become a key voice for Europe at the White House amid the Ukraine war.

items.title: Denmark to boost Greenland defence with new ships, jets and HQ
items.description: Denmark will buy US F-35 fighter jets and new ships to defend Greenland - a resource-rich Danish territory that President Trump wants to control.

items.title: Trump administration starts laying off thousands of workers
items.description: More than 4,000 workers across seven agencies will receive notices that their jobs are being cut, the government disclosed in a court filing.

items.title: 'They treated us like animals' - Inside the epicentre of deportations in New York City
items.description: Chaotic scenes have become routine in a federal immigration court in Manhattan.
